page.title: 14TRAVELLING TRADESMEN
page.content:
{TRAVELLING TRADESMEN}
The fish and chip van comes round every Friday between 8.00 and 9.00p.m. The libary comes round every other Friday and has all kinds of books in it.The vegtable van comes round every Saturday around 4.00 it used to sell sweets and drinks but itjust sells fruit and veg now.The paperman comes on a Sunday in the morning and delivers the Sunday papers.The ice_cream van comes around in the summer and sometimes different ice_cream vans come.The baker comes on a Tuesday and Thursday it's a van that comes from the weston bakery down at Morda.
